title: LEGENDARY FORT BATTLE  - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
description:
Hungarian Scouts have reported a large Keivan Rus army marching their way.  Outnumbered and nowhere left to go they decide to put fortifications around a nearby river.  Their only option is to stand and fight, and hope for a miracle!  Enjoy another Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
